mapper.select: SELECT * FROM system_metrics WHERE component_name = #{componentName} ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO system_metrics ( component_name, cpu_usage, mem_usage, disk_usage, network_rate, process_count, timestamp ) VALUES ( #{componentName}, #{cpuUsage}, #{memUsage}, #{diskUsage}, #{networkRate}, #{processCount}, #{timestamp} )
